entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kenora
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:26 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -30.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kenora Airport 12:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -30.3°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 69 %

Dewpoint: -34.2°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
